reviews.review_content: I agree with the other review. Perfectly nice guy, and a solid teacher. I would recommend to all German students that they buy Schaum's Outlines of German Grammar (any bookstore will have it in the study aids section). It is much more systematic and clearer than the text book, which really sucks. Use it for reference, to fill in gaps in the text books exposition of german grammar, and you will go far.

Was really structured with no suprises; collected homework almost daily and handed it back the next day corrected, weather or not it was taken as a grade. Flexible with office hours. Tough explainations of grammar. 
Workload:
daily, but not intensive.
